verses.verse: A Song <WH7892> of degrees <WH4609>. They that trust <WH982> <WH8802> in the YY <WH3068> shall be as mount <WH2022> TZiyon <WH6726>, which cannot be removed <WH4131> <WH8735>, but abideth <WH3427> <WH8799> for ever <WH5769>.
As the mountains <WH2022> are round about <WH5439> Yerushalayim <WH3389>, so the YY <WH3068> is round about <WH5439> his people <WH5971> from henceforth even for <WH5704> ever <WH5769>.

For the rod <WH7626> of the wicked <WH7562> shall not rest <WH5117> <WH8799> upon the lot <WH1486> of the righteous <WH6662>; lest <WH4616> the righteous <WH6662> put forth <WH7971> <WH8799> their hands <WH3027> unto iniquity <WH5766>.
Do good <WH2895> <WH8685>, O YY <WH3068>, unto those that be good <WH2896>, and to them that are upright <WH3477> in their hearts <WH3826>.

As for such as turn aside <WH5186> <WH8688> unto their crooked ways <WH6128>, the YY <WH3068> shall lead them forth <WH3212> <WH8686> with the workers <WH6466> <WH8802> of iniquity <WH205>: but peace <WH7965> shall be upon Yisra'EL <WH3478>.
